quoteText:
COOKIES POLICY

1. The Website does not store any information automatically, except the information contained in cookie files.

2. Cookie files are computer data, especially text files, which are stored in the User’s device and are needed to navigate on the Website.
title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

tosdr.tldr: The Cookie Policy states, "The Website does not store any information automatically, except the information contained in cookie files.. The subject saving cookies on the User’s device and getting access to them is the operator of the Website, Brainly sp. z o.o."
